thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 14 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Omega Receives Approval To Transition Majority Of Orianna Portfolio

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Omega Receives Approval To Transition Majority Of Orianna Portfolio
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Omega Healthcare Investors Inc:
* OMEGA RECEIVES APPROVAL TO TRANSITION MAJORITY OF ORIANNA PORTFOLIO; SIGNATURE PORTFOLIO RESTRUCTURING COMPLETED
* OMEGA HEALTHCARE INVESTORS INC - RECEIVED COURT APPROVAL TO BEGIN ORDERLY TRANSITION TO NEW OPERATORS OF 23 OF 42 FACILITIES
* OMEGA HEALTHCARE INVESTORS - COURT APPROVED PROCEDURES FOR SOLICITATION OF COMPETING PROPOSALS FOR SALE/ RESTRUCTURING OF 19 REMAINING FACILITIES
* OMEGA HEALTHCARE INVESTORS - ON MAY 11, BANKRUPTCY COURT APPROVED ON FINAL BASIS $30 MILLION SENIOR SECURED DIP FINANCING PROVIDED BY OMEGA TO ORIANNA Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
